line.comment: * DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
* NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.

line.text: 'Mercenaries can be hired to protect one of your assets, ship or station.'
'To hire a mercenary, you must make a single payment, then pay a regular wage every 10 minutes.'
'When not hired, they will roam the galaxy and sometimes smuggle illegal wares from a station to another.'
'If you scan a smuggler, he will turn as pirate and you will be able to kill him without suffering any penalty.'

sval.val: Mercenaries can be hired to protect one of your assets, ship or station.
To hire a mercenary, you must make a single payment, then pay a regular wage every 10 minutes.
When not hired, they will roam the galaxy and sometimes smuggle illegal wares from a station to another.
If you scan a smuggler, he will turn as pirate and you will be able to kill him without suffering any penalty.
DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.
